sentences.sContent: Plant pathogenic bacteria are tiny prokaryote with the characteristic of rapid propagation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Plant pathogenic bacteria are tiny prokaryote with the characteristic of rapid propagation.
sentences.sCn: 植物病原细菌是寄生在植物上的原核生物，个体微小，繁殖速度快。

trans.tranOther: any organism having cells in each of which the genetic material is in a single DNA chain, not enclosed in a nucleus
